MP3?: I did, "Hello how can I transfer files to and from an MP3 player plugged in via USB?  Rhythmbox can read the files, but I cannot find the player in the file explorer.  I'd like to copy the files on it to my hard drive and then transfer new files to the device.'
mtpfs                                                   - FUSE filesystem for Media Transfer Protocol devices
sudo aptitude install mtpfs & mtpfs /mnt & ls /mnt (try please)
open a terminal: sudo mtpfs /mnt  (or where you want)
